column4: In 11.04, how do I get the system monitor added to the top bar?  In 10.10, I could right-click and add.  I can't right-click on the bar anymore
Wow.  Ubuntu feels a lot like Windows 7 now.  What a let-down
you should be able to select gnome 2 as your session when you log in if you don't like unity. and then you'll be able to use your panel applets as well
